item.title: Speaker Series (Spring 2021)
item.description: Here is a summary and schedule of the YuQC Speaker Series. Information & Recordings Check out this Youtube playlist of all past talk recordings!! Please click here (yale.edu account required) to access zoom links, meeting passwords, and, eventually, recordings for this speaker series. Students in Quantum Night Hosted by YuQC and Stanford QCA March 17, 8-9:30PM ET The YuQC Speaker Series is happy to announce Students in Quantum night.
